author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
QQ about test generation. I'm working on updating the tests to not use a sender with code anymore.
After modifying the sender code I run the `--filltests` command. The tests however still fails and the post hashes in the filled tests do not update.
Is there a command to automatically update the post roots or do I need to manually compute it somehow?

author: mariusvanderwijden
marekm3498
content: Could/should we add TxType to test cases? For example here: https://github.com/ethereum/tests/blob/eip1559-state-test/GeneralStateTests/stEIP1559/lowFeeCap.json#L54
